{
	dataset(
		id: "{{ .dataset_id }}"
	) {
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		keywords
        requesters
    datasource {
      __typename
      ...on BigQuery {
        piiTags
      }
    }

	}
}

RETURNS
{
  "data": {
    "dataset": {
      "name": "Updated Name",
      "description": "Updated description",
      "keywords": [
        "keyword1",
        "keyword2"
      ],
      "pii": "sensitive",
      "repo": "someotherrepo",
      "requesters": ["all-users@nav.no", "nada@nav.no"],
       "datasource": {
          "__typename": "BigQuery",
          "piiTags": "{\"test\":\"tag\"}"
      }
    }
  }
}
